item.title: Can R and Shiny make me a better fisherman? Part 1
item.author: aurelien.callens@gmail.com (Aurelien Callens)
item.description: My favorite hobby, in addition to R coding of course, is fishing. Most of the time, I am fishing European sea bass (Dicentrarchus labrax) in estuaries. The sea bass is a predatory fish that has a broad range of preys: crabs, sand eels, prawns, shrimps and other fish. To catch these predators, I don’t use live baits, I prefer to use artificial lures that imitate a specific prey.
